text:
There are forty stations currently participating in the
network service. It is proposed that in the future the network
will be fed via four legs. This plan will enable us to offer
all program® to all stations. It will also reduce the total
time required to complete a series, which in turn will allow
the distribution of a greater number of programs. At the
same time we will avoid some of the breakdowns. As new stations
are added they will be included In one of the legs.
